articles.author: Kyle Feldscher
articles.title: Oklahoma City Thunder easily roll past Indiana Pacers to even up NBA Finals - CNN
articles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder evened up the NBA Finals on Sunday by rolling the Indiana Pacers, easing to a 123-107 victory that washed away some of the bad taste left by the Pacers’ dramatic win in the series’ opening game.
